programme.title: My Wife's Double Life Ep10
programme.desc: Adapted from a novel by author Yan Nong, a thief is tasked with finding implicating proof against a minister, only for her to marry and fall in love with the minister's son.

programme.title: The Caller
programme.desc: Two women, stuck in similar situations with abusive husbands, connected through a call despite being separated by time. Their budding relationship takes a dark turn when one of their fates changes.

programme.title: Fated Hearts Ep19
programme.desc: A red-clad archer & the rival prince meet through political conflicts, turning mutual use to true devotion. Blending court intrigue & martial arts, revenge & growth, with both sweet & bitter emotions.

programme.title: Fated Hearts Ep20
programme.desc: A red-clad archer & the rival prince meet through political conflicts, turning mutual use to true devotion. Blending court intrigue & martial arts, revenge & growth, with both sweet & bitter emotions.

programme.title: Follow Your Heart Ep09
programme.desc: A sweet love story between Jiang Xinbai, a cold and aloof prince suffering from face blindness, and Yan Nanxing, a passionate female traveling doctor who harbors a dark secret.

programme.title: Follow Your Heart Ep10
programme.desc: A sweet love story between Jiang Xinbai, a cold and aloof prince suffering from face blindness, and Yan Nanxing, a passionate female traveling doctor who harbors a dark secret.

programme.title: Lost Identity Ep26
programme.desc: Top spy couple Huang Jing Yu and Xin Zhi Lei join forces! Ou Xiao'an escapes a Japanese biochemical lab and teams up with Qian Mo Qing to uncover secrets and expose Japanese spies.

programme.desc: Top spy couple Huang Jing Yu and Xin Zhi Lei join forces! Ou Xiao'an escapes a Japanese biochemical lab and teams up with Qian Mo Qing to uncover secrets and expose Japanese spies.

programme.title: Blocking The Horse
programme.desc: Ten years later after the death of General Yang Ye, Yang Ba Jie & Yang Jiu Mei are determined to regain their father's lost treasured blade & restore the glory of the Great Song Empire.

programme.title: Fortune Teller
programme.desc: Zhao Da Chun is a well-known local psychic who privately joined forces with his younger brother to help fortune tellers solve practical problems, leading to many amusing situations.

programme.title: Shuigui Bride
programme.desc: On a stormy night, 8 people gather in a dilapidated temple to take shelter from the rain. They begin discussing the legend of the Water Ghost Bride, kick-starting a series of mysterious murders.

programme.title: The Rap Of China 2025 Ep04
programme.desc: With fierce rap battles, star producers & mainstream artists joining in, this season features Huang Zi Tao, Vinida Weng, Yan Hao Xiang, TizzyT & Capper.

programme.title: City of the City Ep03
programme.desc: A story of two generations navigating financial storms and ethical dilemmas in the cutthroat world of finance. From executives to employees, it explores moral choices amid money-driven ambitions.

programme.title: City of the City Ep04
programme.desc: A story of two generations navigating financial storms and ethical dilemmas in the cutthroat world of finance. From executives to employees, it explores moral choices amid money-driven ambitions.

programme.title: Island Python
programme.desc: When an unscrupulous organisation made plans to transform the peaceful & tranquil Xiangyang Street into a tourist resort, residents are forced to fight for their home town or relocate.

programme.title: The Legend Of Yang Jian
programme.desc: Yang Jian descends Kunlun mountain to retrieve Pangu's axe, battling Shen Gong Bao with assistance from Xiao Tian, Feng Ling'er, Feng You Wei and others.

programme.title: The Rap Of China 2025 Ep05
programme.desc: With fierce rap battles, star producers & mainstream artists joining in, this season features Huang Zi Tao, Vinida Weng, Yan Hao Xiang, TizzyT & Capper.

programme.title: The Drunken Prodigy
programme.desc: A spoiled young man with a passion for martial arts loses his entire fortune when he falls victim to a series of traps set by malicious gang while pursuing the top courtesan.

programme.title: Green Snake
programme.desc: Green Snake, who does not eat humans but only demons, is attacked and driven away after a misunderstanding. After her escape, she meets Little Ghost & they forge a friendship as they travelled.

programme.title: Nvxia Fan Lihua
programme.desc: Fan Li Hua fell in love with Xue Ding Shan at first sight, but he only wants her to return to the battlefield to eliminate bandits. It is only through hardships that the two begin to understand each other.

programme.title: The Chi Dragon Slash
programme.desc: At the end of the Tang Dynasty, Navy General Qian Liu set off to exterminate the river pirates, only to discover a mystical two-headed beast called the Chi dragon in a cave.

programme.desc: Top spy couple Huang Jing Yu and Xin Zhi Lei join forces! Ou Xiao'an escapes a Japanese biochemical lab and teams up with Qian Mo Qing to uncover secrets and expose Japanese spies.

programme.desc: Top spy couple Huang Jing Yu and Xin Zhi Lei join forces! Ou Xiao'an escapes a Japanese biochemical lab and teams up with Qian Mo Qing to uncover secrets and expose Japanese spies.

programme.title: The Tiger King Returns
programme.desc: After a village, which worshipped the White Tiger as its mountain deity, unexpectedly fell victim to a massacre by said tiger, the residents sought the help of a legendary hunter to resolve the matter.

programme.title: Haunted Xiangxi
programme.desc: When a Feng Shui master unexpectedly falls into a trap set by the cunning Gold Old Monster, he is coerced into exploring the ancient tombs of Xiangxi for the monster's nefarious purpose.

programme.title: Guardian Of Graveyard
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Xun Ye, Feng Yao, Cai Qing Yun, Wang Ya Zi & others encounter various dangers as they seek treasure at Qinling Phoenix Mountain, even averting conspiracies & diplomatic issues.

programme.desc: With fierce rap battles, star producers & mainstream artists joining in, this season features Huang Zi Tao, Vinida Weng, Yan Hao Xiang, TizzyT & Capper.

programme.title: Atrocious
programme.desc: A group of travellers goes in search of ancient tombs where mysterious treasures were said to appear whenever thick fog came & ethereal sounds echoed, only to meet gruesome deaths one after another.

programme.desc: A story of two generations navigating financial storms and ethical dilemmas in the cutthroat world of finance. From executives to employees, it explores moral choices amid money-driven ambitions.

programme.title: The Cursed Village
programme.desc: On their wedding night, Liu Jin is killed and Shen Xiu Xiu assaulted. Soon, men in Fengming Village die mysteriously in bridal attire. Chu Qi & Xu Yi Ming search for her sister and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Snake Island Survival
programme.desc: Years after losing his wife, Zhang Yong joins his old station chief on a mission to go deep into the mysterious Snake Island to uncover the cause of a marine pollution incident.

programme.title: Hunt The Wicked
programme.desc: After multiple encounters & life-and-death games revolving the secrets of a mysterious & sinister city, brilliant detective Huang Mingjin & the genius criminal Wei Yunzhou join hands to punish evil.

programme.title: Detective Dee And The Punished Swellhead
programme.desc: When a mysterious curse causes people to undergo physical changes or be devoured by demonic beings, detective Dee is tasked with finding out the truth & to resolve the impossible curse.
